title: An Earnest Unrequited Love, Wanting to Make it Bear a Little Happiness. - Novel Updates
tags: Based on a Song   Divination   Female Protagonist   Short Story   Vocaloid   Yandere
author: Torii Hitsuji   Utata-P   鳥居羊
description:
Liking someone and wanting to be noticed by him.

With such a thought, Mayu earnestly read Usausa Divination. [Your lucky items are a rabbit, an axe, and long piece of metal, I think]. 

After buying her lucky item, a strange package was delivered to her house.>
